full_summary:
# Cancelled Tender 

## Notice Details

* **Notice Number:** PW-23-01022140
* **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0210/A
* **Publication Date:** January 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 2, 2023 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date:** March 1, 2023

## Tender Status

This tender offer has been CANCELLED. The announcement was made public on January 19, 2023.

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada
* **End User Entities:** Parks Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to Canadian free trade participants.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** This contract opportunity is open to bidders from across Canada.
* **Regions of Delivery:** The tender is primarily aimed at bidding contractors in the Nunavut Territory.

## Tender Description

The tender has been canceled due to unspecified circumstances. The precise reason is provided below:

This notice has been cancelled due to internal reasons.

## Contact Details

For further information about this tender or to inquire about cancelled tenders, please contact:
* Cloë Pelland-Tessier
* Email: [cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca](mailto:cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 418 928-7252
* Location: Québec, QC, Canada G1R 3Z8

**Note: All communications regarding cancelled tenders will receive a neutral response.**  Please keep in mind that a cancelled tender means that no further information or updates will be provided. Should you require technical documentation on conducting successful bids on future tenders, kindly refer to applicable government documentation on the solicitation page.
